TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InputLanguageChangingEventHandler(object sender, InputLanguageChangingEventArgs e);

remarks.para: When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
For more information about handling events with delegates, see Events and Delegates.

summary.para: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .
